escape-html¶

Escape string for use in HTML

Example¶

var escape = require('escape-html');
var html = escape('foo & bar');
// -> foo &amp; bar

Benchmark¶

$ npm run-script bench

> escape-html@1.0.3 bench nodejs-escape-html
> node benchmark/index.js
